name: Rush Man
description:
RushMan is a platformer with a twist from time to time your inputs (WSAD) will swap. The game was made for Brackeys GameJam 2021.2.

Interpretation of a Theme (Let there be chaos):

Chaos in our interpretation is something that is hard to control almost random so that's why we stuck with idea where your buttons change places and you need to constantly adapt and not fall

Few More words:

As this is our first jam I'm not exacly sure but in the bonus level we made a 8-bit cover of song: Survivor - Eye Of The Tiger

Also,also:

The game art style was made to emulate old flash game as a tribute
